Name: War of Kings
About the game: You have to participate in the war for independence. Faithful soldiers who are called for magical resources help you with this. Some units have increased health, some attack from afar. Magic will also help in the confrontation. Slowdowns, magical explosions, fireballs... all this will help you fight the invaders. War of Kings is a 2D auto battler in which you have to win the battle against evil monsters coming from all sides in an endless stream. Discover the talents of the commander of a huge fantasy army and lead it to light and peace! -Dynamic gameplay -Dangerous enemies -Interesting gameplay
